_meanings:
{@--2@} To be cast at, be
directed to wards; <ls>R. 6. 11.</ls>

{@--4@} To fall or 
descend into, meet in; <ls>R. 10. 26.</ls>

{@--6@} To
happen, occur, take place, fall to
one's lot; {#sakfdaMSo nipatati#}  
<ls>Ms. 9. 47.</ls>

{@--7@} To be placed, occupy a place;
{#aByarhitaM pUrvaM nipatati#}.

{@--1@} To cause to fall down,
throw or hurl down.

{@--6@} To raise or
levy (as a tribute).

{@--7@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>)
To put down as a special or 
irregular form, to mention as an irregular
formation; {#ete paMcaviMSatirajaMtA#} 
{#nipAtyaMte#} <ls>Sk.</ls>
